question:
Your child's school is going for a trip out of the country for 3 days and parent is allowed to join the group. Write a letter to school.

In your letter, you should:
•	ask questions about the trip
•	tell them why you want to join the group
•	explain how you can help.
text: I am a mother of Shahil Sultan, who is a student of class 4 in your school, and writing to you regarding the trip to Kolkata from the school. I and my husband are exceedingly interested to join the trip with my son.

Although I got an email related to the field tour, I need some detail information about the trip. I want to know about the program schedule of 3 days, accommodation facilities and the cost of the whole visit. Please inform me of the payment procedure so that I can manage everything in due time.

As we do not spend enough time with our son due to our hectic lifestyle, this tour will allow us to enjoy quality time with him. Moreover, parents will also create a strong bonding with the teachers as well as other families.
Because I am working in a travel and tour company, I can manage cheaper tickets for the whole group. I can use my employee code to get a discount in any hotel also.
Looking forward to hearing from you more about the trip and thank you for the excellent initiative.
